alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:08AM CST until February 24 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Jackson and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, water covers the main road at Plum Bluff in southern George County. At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 22.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Friday was 22.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 12.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
